synopsis.text:
Goku Uniforms granting extraordinary abilities dictate the ruthless hierarchy at Honnouji Academy, overseen by the formidable student council president, Satsuki Kiryuuin, and her Elite Four. Into this world steps Ryuuko Matoi, a determined young woman on a quest to avenge her father's murder. Armed with only half of her father's invention, the Scissor Blade, she challenges the iron-fisted rule of Satsuki, who may hold the key to the identity of the killer.

As Ryuuko faces the relentless power of the Elite Four and the students in their superhuman uniforms, she stumbles upon Senketsu, a rare and sentient Kamui, or God Clothes. Bonding with Ryuuko through her blood, Senketsu provides her with unparalleled strength. With her newfound power and the Scissor Blade, Ryuuko confronts the oppressive regime at Honnouji Academy, determined to unveil the truth behind her father's murder and bring the culprit to justice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
